attributes.action: Find the government incompetent to perform their jobs as they are completely out of touch with the reality of the electorate - the people who voted them in and pay their salaries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government have become so completely disconnected from the public and they have again shown this by totally disregarding 1.7m people who signed a petition saying they were unhappy with the proposed road charging scheme.

If we receive enough signatories then the government might actually notice that there are several million people out there who don't believe the hype, the spin or the lies that come from them - and they might actually decide to do something for the general good instead of justifying their existence & making empty promises pre-election.

We want a government that CARES about the electorate, keeps its word and does the RIGHT THING even in the face of politican pressure to do the popular thing and finally, LISTENS to the public.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
